name: Recreation at GASP
description: Allowing students the freedom to choose their own recreation activities is crucial for their growth and development. By providing a wide range of options, such as board games, arts and crafts, building blocks, Legos, card games, imagination games, staff-led sports, social time, and group games, they empower students to explore their interests, develop their skills, and foster their creativity.

whatTheyOffer: Allowing students the freedom to choose their own recreation activities is crucial for their growth and development. By providing a wide range of options, such as board games, arts and crafts, building blocks, Legos, card games, imagination games, staff-led sports, social time, and group games, they empower students to explore their interests, develop their skills, and foster their creativity.
howToGetIt: The Registration Process will be to fill out and return the family packet and liability waiver to the GASP Office. Then we will invite families to register via our online registration system, iCare. Returning families will be asked to make sure that their information in iCare is current. If you have questions, please email gasp.grattan@gmail.com Go to [https://www.gasp-grattan.org/enrollment-page] for forms and enrollment information.
cost: Full Time Regular Pick: $500.00 Part Time (any 3 days-regular pick up): $425.00 Sibling Discount: 10% (Applies to one sibling only). Tuition assistance available.
